title: Delilah-Belle Hamlin and her Love Island beau Eyal Booker dress as Jasmine and Aladdin
text:
They were first romantically linked over the summer when they cosied up together at Coachella Festival.

And Love Island's Eyal Booker and Delilah-Belle Hamlin still looked smitten as they walked hand in hand to the Hallowzeem Party at the M Restaurant in Victoria.

The former Love Islander, 24, and his girlfriend, 21, dressed as Disney's Aladdin and Jasmine for the star-studded event on Friday.

Loved up: Eyal Booker and Delilah-Belle Hamlin looked smitten as they walked hand in hand to the Hallowzeem Party at the M Restaurant in Victoria

Eyal exposed his chiselled chest as he teamed a blue and purple waistcoat with white trousers and a cream turban headdress.

He completed the look with a pair of black trainers and wore silver chains around his neck to perfect his fancy dress ensemble to perfection.

Glitter had been spread over his toned torso to enhance the look of his abs and add a magical touch to the barely-there look.

Look of love? The former Love Islander, 24, and his girlfriend, 21, dressed as Disney's Aladdin and Jasmine for the star-studded event on Friday

Attractive: Eyal exposed his chiselled chest as he teamed a blue and purple waistcoat with white trousers and a cream turban headdress

Meanwhile, Delilah, the daughter of US reality star Lisa Rinna, stunned in a golden sequinned bra which exposed her toned midriff.

Over her tanned pins she wore sheer blue trousers that were cinched in at the ankle to recreate the loose and flowing Jasmine ensemble. The bottoms were covered in intricately sewn flowers.

She wore gold platform shoes on her feet and enhanced her features with an intense gold highlighter. The brunette beauty accessorised with gold hoop earrings and a wore a jewel on her forehead.

Shimmering: The former Love Islander completed the look with a pair of black trainers and wore silver chains around his neck. Glitter had been spread over his toned torso to enhance the look of his abs

Jasmine double: Delilah, the daughter of Lisa Rinna, stunned in a golden sequinned bralette that exposed her toned midriff

Eyal has had little luck with past romances as he enrolled himself on Love Island and Celebs Go Dating to find the perfect woman in 2018.

He struck up a blossoming romance with model Hayley Hughes, 22, on Love Island on the first day but the pair dramatically uncoupled after a few days on the show.

He quickly moved on with Megan Barton Hanson, 25, and the couple were the first to get steamy between the sheets on the 2018 series.

Smitten: Earlier in the week, Delilah and Eyal Booker attended the star-studded Cara Delevingne x Nasty Girl launch held at London 's The Box in Soho on Tuesday

However, Megan soon pied off the spiritual hunk when she decided to pursue a romance with Wes Nelson, then 21.

During the Love Island Christmas reunion, Eyal shared a kiss with former shoe shop worker Kendall Rae Knight, 27, but the romance soon fizzled out.

Delilah appears to have something of a penchant for Love Island boys as she was seen looking cosy with Adam Collard, 23, in Los Angeles in April.

Singing career: Earlier this month, Eyal auditioned with his Love Island band The Islanders, which is formed of Zara McDermott, Wes Nelson and Samira Mighty, on The X Factor: Celebrity - they are through to the live shows (pictured at a photocall)

Earlier this month, Eyal auditioned with his Love Island band The Islanders, which is formed of Zara McDermott, Wes Nelson and Samira Mighty, on The X Factor: Celebrity - they sung a rendition of Shawn Mendes' There's Nothing Holdin' Me Back.

They seemed to impress the panel, but judge Simon Cowell did note that they need to work on finding their distinct sound.

The Islanders made it through to the next stage, the live shows, which start this Saturday on ITV and have been mentored by Simon.
description: Eyal Booker, 24, and Delilah-Belle Hamlin, 21, still looked smitten as they walked hand in hand to the Hallowzeem Party at the M Restaurant in Victoria.
